alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:39PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Line of strong thunderstorms sweeping northeast through Oakley and City of Rocks toward Malta through 545 PM MDT... At 437 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Oakley to near Oakley Reservoir to 25 miles southeast of Jackpot. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, half inch hail, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Malta, Oakley Reservoir, Lake Walcott, Oakley, Declo, Albion, Elba, Almo, Yale Rest Area, Mt Harrison, City Of Rocks, Idahome, and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
